About this Item

This is most likely Daniel C. Robinson (b. 1803) in Brooklyn, Connecticut. In the 1860 Census he is listed as being a Trader, still living in Brooklyn. https://www.ancestry.com/discoveryui-content/view/17591114:7667?tid=&pid=&queryId=4b1830c6a738dd373815836b51392908&_phsrc=ZOy131&_phstart=successSource
